languages.text: "Это было не покушение, а угроза. Чернь затевает мятеж и пытается устрашить нас. "Вы скоро захлебнетесь в крови" — бунтари любят такие метафоры".

"It wasn't an attempt on the Lord Captain's life — it was a threat. The rabble are planning a revolt, so they're trying to terrorise us. 'Soon, you will drown in blood' — insurgents pride themselves on such metaphors."
languages.original_text: "Это было не покушение, а угроза. Чернь затевает мятеж и пытается устрашить нас. "Вы скоро захлебнетесь в крови" — бунтари любят такие метафоры".

"It wasn't an attempt on the Lord Captain's life — it was a threat. The rabble are planning a revolt, so they're trying to terrorise us. 'Soon, you will drown in blood' — insurgents pride themselves on such metaphors."

languages.text: « Ce n'était pas un attentat contre la vie {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, mais une menace. La populace fomente une révolte, et elle cherche à nous effrayer. À nous faire comprendre que le sang ne tardera pas à couler, le genre de métaphore dont les rebelles sont friands. »
languages.original_text: "It wasn't an attempt on the Lord Captain's life — it was a threat. The rabble are planning a revolt, so they're trying to terrorise us. 'Soon, you will drown in blood' — insurgents pride themselves on such metaphors."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'était pas un attentat contre la vie {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, mais une menace. La populace fomente une révolte, et elle cherche à nous effrayer. À nous faire comprendre que le sang ne tardera pas à couler, le genre de métaphore dont les rebelles sont friands. »

languages.text: «No fue un intento de asesinato contra {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, sino una amenaza. La plebe está planeando una revuelta, así que intenta intimidarnos. "Pronto os ahogaremos en sangre"; los insurgentes se enorgullecen de esas metáforas».
languages.original_text: "It wasn't an attempt on the Lord Captain's life — it was a threat. The rabble are planning a revolt, so they're trying to terrorise us. 'Soon, you will drown in blood' — insurgents pride themselves on such metaphors."

traits.locale_text: «No fue un intento de asesinato contra {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, sino una amenaza. La plebe está planeando una revuelta, así que intenta intimidarnos. "Pronto os ahogaremos en sangre"; los insurgentes se enorgullecen de esas metáforas».

languages.text: “他们之前的行为并不是打算刺杀舰长大人，而是个威胁。那群乌合之众在谋划叛乱，他们打算恐吓我们。‘用不了多久，你们就会被鲜血淹没’——暴乱分子很喜欢用这样的隐喻。”
languages.original_text: "It wasn't an attempt on the Lord Captain's life — it was a threat. The rabble are planning a revolt, so they're trying to terrorise us. 'Soon, you will drown in blood' — insurgents pride themselves on such metaphors."

traits.locale_text: “他们之前的行为并不是打算刺杀舰长大人，而是个威胁。那群乌合之众在谋划叛乱，他们打算恐吓我们。‘用不了多久，你们就会被鲜血淹没’——暴乱分子很喜欢用这样的隐喻。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンの命を狙ったのではありません。これは…脅しです。暴徒たちは反乱を計画していて、私たちを脅そうとしているのです。『もうすぐ、血の海に溺れ死ぬ』…反乱軍はそんな比喩に誇りを持っています」
languages.original_text: "It wasn't an attempt on the Lord Captain's life — it was a threat. The rabble are planning a revolt, so they're trying to terrorise us. 'Soon, you will drown in blood' — insurgents pride themselves on such metaphors."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンの命を狙ったのではありません。これは…脅しです。暴徒たちは反乱を計画していて、私たちを脅そうとしているのです。『もうすぐ、血の海に溺れ死ぬ』…反乱軍はそんな比喩に誇りを持っています」

languages.text: "Es war kein Anschlag auf das Leben des Lord Captains — es war eine Drohung. Der Pöbel plant eine Revolte, daher versuchen sie, uns zu terrorisieren. 'Bald werdet Ihr in Blut ertrinken' — Aufständische haben eine Schwäche für derartige Metaphern."
languages.original_text: "It wasn't an attempt on the Lord Captain's life — it was a threat. The rabble are planning a revolt, so they're trying to terrorise us. 'Soon, you will drown in blood' — insurgents pride themselves on such metaphors."

traits.locale_text: "Es war kein Anschlag auf das Leben des Lord Captains — es war eine Drohung. Der Pöbel plant eine Revolte, daher versuchen sie, uns zu terrorisieren. 'Bald werdet Ihr in Blut ertrinken' — Aufständische haben eine Schwäche für derartige Metaphern."

languages.text: "Vukuatta Lord Kaptan'ın canına kastedilmemişti. Tehdit maksadı taşıyordu. Ayaktakımı isyan planlıyor, o yüzden de bizi korkutmaya çalışıyor. Asiler, 'Yakında kan içinde boğulacaksın.' gibi metaforlarla iftihar eder."
languages.original_text: "It wasn't an attempt on the Lord Captain's life — it was a threat. The rabble are planning a revolt, so they're trying to terrorise us. 'Soon, you will drown in blood' — insurgents pride themselves on such metaphors."
